meanings.def: a male member of a royal family who is not king, especially the son or grandson of the king or queen
examples: prince of… the Prince of Wales

meanings.def: the male ruler of a small country or state that has a royal family; a male member of this family, especially the son or grandson of the ruler
examples: prince of… the prince of Orange

meanings.def: a man who is thought to be one of the best in a particular field

(1958-2016) a US pop singer and actor. He was born Prince Rogers Nelson in Minneapolis. In 1993 he changed his name into a symbol that nobody could pronounce, so he was called 'the Artist Formerly Known as Prince'. He changed his name back to Prince in 2000. He shocked some people with his sexual songs and performances on stage. He was the star of the film Purple Rain (1984) and won an Oscar for its music. He also wrote the music for Batman (1989).

(1619-82) an English soldier. He was the grandson of King James I and is best remembered for commanding the Royalist cavalry (= soldiers on horses) during the English Civil War. He was defeated at the battles of Marston Moor and Naseby, but escaped abroad, returning to England after the Restoration. He later helped to form the Hudson's Bay Company and the Royal Society.
